column4: I want to use apt-get to download the binary (not source) .deb files for a package I already have installed. I have tried: apt-get -d --force-yes install package with no luck. Does anyone have any tips?
adding in the -d flag to just dl I assume?
I don't want to actually change the local system at all in terms of installation, just download the .deb to put it on a cd
